name: Bad Day At The Office (JamesLindeman)
description:
Bad Day At The Office is an office escape game.

The office building you work at is about to collapse. The security system has locked all the doors  there is fire everywhere and you are on the top floor. You have 9 minutes to escape the office building.

Known Bugs: Doors are quite buggy and can jump around a bit.  Animations are also quite buggy and are not too great, gonna try and fix these in a later version.

Assets used:

Synty Simple Apocalypse: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simple-apocalypse-cartoon-...

Synty Simple Apocalypse Interiors: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/simple-apocalypse-interi...

Synty Simple Office Interiors: https://syntystore.com/products/simple-office-cartoon-assets
